item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="1" video_fullscreen="true" blox_bg_attachment="false" blox_cover="true" blox_repeat="no-repeat" blox_dark="false" parallax_speed="6" process_count="3" video_type="video/youtube" video_pattern="true" maxslider_parallax="true" maxslider_pattern="true" latest_title="News" latest_title_type="1" latest_content="Content goes here" latest_link_text="see all posts" latest_link_url="#" latest_readmore="Read more"][vc_column width="1/1"][layerslider_vc id="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="6/12"][distance type="3"][maxtitle type="1"]We Build our products to represent our Values[/maxtitle][vc_column_text el_class="pad-r40"]Brazil – Beyond the Limits is a clean minimalistic theme that brings all the features that you are expecting from us like our other themes. It comes with a bunch of features to make your website incredible flexible so you can make every page unique if you want. Brazil is a very clean and minimal WordPress theme that is great for business websites as well as blogs. Brazil is easy to use and has a very professional design. The responsive design of Brazil makes it to be a good option, as it enables your site to display intuitively and beautifully on all types of mobile devices. The theme makes use of CSS media queries in triggering different layout sets based on the screen size of the device being used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" el_class="pad-r30 pad-l40"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="4"][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Ultra-Responsive Design" icon_name="icomoon-mobile"]Brazil is easiest way to build a website with its 100% responsive an retina ready layouts.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Advanced Theme Options" icon_name="icomoon-keyboard-2"]We include an extremely advanced admin panel allowing users to quickly and easily customize the theme.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="One Click Demo Install" icon_name="icomoon-history"]We have biult a demo content importer directly inside theme options, simply click the button and you get the demo content.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Search engine Optimization" icon_name="icomoon-stack-2"]This theme is created based on running smooth for search engines Its work perfectly well with the common SEO plug-ins.[/iconbox][distance type="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_height="490" video_fullscreen="true" blox_bg_attachment="false" blox_cover="true" blox_repeat="no-repeat" blox_dark="false" blox_bgcolor="#ececec" parallax_speed="6" process_count="3" video_type="video/youtube" video_pattern="true" maxslider_parallax="true" maxslider_pattern="true" latest_title="News" latest_title_type="1" latest_content="Content goes here" latest_link_text="see all posts" latest_link_url="#" latest_readmore="Read more" blox_padding_top="30px" blox_padding_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2" el_class="no-mb"][distance type="1"][vc_single_image image="2125" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="no-mb"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text][maxtitle type="1"]Focus on the content.[/maxtitle] Brazil is said to be the ultimate theme for online business. It presents a modern business solutions packed with a great quantity of high end features. This theme features a visual composer with 36 drag and drop building blocks, a revolutions slider and layer slider with ultimate WP plug-ins, images and multi-media display, customizable color and layout and custom page templates. It is superbly responsive adapting to any kinds of smart phones and mobile devices.[/vc_column_text][distance type="1"][button url="#" target="_self" color="gray" size="small" border="true"]SEE MORE[/button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="aligncenter"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

We Build our products to represent our Values

Brazil – Beyond the Limits is a clean minimalistic theme that brings all the features that you are expecting from us like our other themes. It comes with a bunch of features to make your website incredible flexible so you can make every page unique if you want. Brazil is a very clean and minimal WordPress theme that is great for business websites as well as blogs. Brazil is easy to use and has a very professional design. The responsive design of Brazil makes it to be a good option, as it enables your site to display intuitively and beautifully on all types of mobile devices. The theme makes use of CSS media queries in triggering different layout sets based on the screen size of the device being used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" el_class="pad-r30 pad-l40"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Ultra-Responsive Design" icon_name="icomoon-mobile"]Brazil is easiest way to build a website with its 100% responsive an retina ready layouts.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Advanced Theme Options" icon_name="icomoon-keyboard-2"]We include an extremely advanced admin panel allowing users to quickly and easily customize the theme.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="One Click Demo Install" icon_name="icomoon-history"]We have biult a demo content importer directly inside theme options, simply click the button and you get the demo content.[/iconbox][iconbox type="0" icon_title="Search engine Optimization" icon_name="icomoon-stack-2"]This theme is created based on running smooth for search engines Its work perfectly well with the common SEO plug-ins.[/iconbox][distance type="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_height="490" video_fullscreen="true" blox_bg_attachment="false" blox_cover="true" blox_repeat="no-repeat" blox_dark="false" blox_bgcolor="#ececec" parallax_speed="6" process_count="3" video_type="video/youtube" video_pattern="true" maxslider_parallax="true" maxslider_pattern="true" latest_title="News" latest_title_type="1" latest_content="Content goes here" latest_link_text="see all posts" latest_link_url="#" latest_readmore="Read more" blox_padding_top="30px" blox_padding_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2" el_class="no-mb"][distance type="1"][vc_single_image image="2125" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="no-mb"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text][maxtitle type="1"]Focus on the content.[/maxtitle] Brazil is said to be the ultimate theme for online business. It presents a modern business solutions packed with a great quantity of high end features. This theme features a visual composer with 36 drag and drop building blocks, a revolutions slider and layer slider with ultimate WP plug-ins, images and multi-media display, customizable color and layout and custom page templates. It is superbly responsive adapting to any kinds of smart phones and mobile devices.[/vc_column_text][button url="#" target="_self" color="gray" size="small" border="true"]SEE MORE[/button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="aligncenter"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

CHECK OUT OUR TEMPLATES

Build your own beautiful templates

Brazil is an all-in-one solution for business websites that is super sleek finding harmony between simplicity and striking design elements. It is fully responsive and supports complete localization
